name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook aims to mitigate an incident where an attacker exploited a phishing email to execute a malicious PowerShell script, leading to unauthorized command execution.

action--3a7b6386-872d-4cfc-b080-59e4fb80.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--3a7b6386-872d-4cfc-b080-59e4fb80.description: Terminate any malicious PowerShell processes that may be running.

if-condition--2c6491d1-a426-4a36-a0ed-2e.name: Check if malicious process has been detected

action--de2d4678-f3d3-41b2-afc9-1f32b004.name: Isolate affected host from network
action--de2d4678-f3d3-41b2-afc9-1f32b004.description: Block all traffic from the compromised host to prevent further actions.

action--cbdf5065-1411-44ab-b2f0-5f06fd0e.name: Run malware scan on isolated host
action--cbdf5065-1411-44ab-b2f0-5f06fd0e.description: Perform a malware scan on the isolated host to find any remaining threats.

while-condition--f2d5fbfd-5c61-4e83-ac84.name: Repeat until scan is clean
while-condition--f2d5fbfd-5c61-4e83-ac84.description: Continue scanning until no malware is detected on the host.
